author: Anonymous Beaker
title: Designing template tag for htdf
question:
If we are designing the @template tag for htdf, and we don't have a fata definition, and our signature is:

(@signature String Number -> String)

Then how would our @template tag look?
How do we know what to put in the @template tag?
student_answer:
Usually, I just use the first consumed datatype in the signature. 
The template function for String and Number aren't going to be different because they're both atomic-non-distinct.
